thread.section_title: Vacuum-Direct.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacuum-Direct.com | vacuum-direct.com | 3 of 115
thread.title: Kathlyn

author: Kathlyn
title: Kathlyn
text: I ordered a part for my Dyson vacuum cleaner on a Sunday afternoon - I got the confirmation notice immediately. Within 10 minutes, I discovered that I didn't need the part and wanted to cancel the order. Vacuum-Direct wasn't available (in person) on the weekend, so I left them a voicemail and an email about this. Monday morning, I had a response that they'd cancelled the order. I was SO expecting a hassle, but there was none - I appreciate them so much for this, and when I DO need a part, will buy from them.
